Terrorsaur:




Terrorsaur, in beast mode flew down to the artic cave that Megatron 
holed up. He flapped his wings, looking around. He drifted over to a 
boulder that would hold him, waiting for something to happen that 
could be useful to his mind, to dim his boredom.

All since his time on-line, he wasn't used to his full advantage. He 
knew there was much more that a Predacon could experience. Certainly 
a bot like him. He needed a challenge.
